name: Microposts
body:
### Welcome to Microposts!
This project is just a running example of how to create a Ruby on Rails application in the style of Twitter. For right now, there is only one person working on the project and is using it as a platform to learn how to program in Rails.

### View all Users and their posts!
Added capability to view all the users who have signed up and what is on their mind with a collective view of all of their posts.

### View Microposts as they are fed in!
With the /posts page you can view all posts as they come in.

### Authors and Contributors
Sean Snyder(@Snyder-) is the main contributor and author of this Twitter style tutorial. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with repository? Check out the documentation at http://github.com/Snyder-/Microposts
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
